name: Shadow Elf Warrior
description: The Shadow Elf Warrior excels in stealth, blending into the darkness and striking unexpectedly. This medium humanoid is equipped with a shortsword and a hand crossbow, both potent in combat.
memorable: The ability to poison and potentially incapacitate foes adds a tactical edge to encounters.
goals: Typical goals include ambushing unsuspecting adventurers and striking from the shadows.
relations: Often associated with other shadow elves or dark-dwelling creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy places or areas of low light.
strengths: High perception and the ability to poison targets during ranged attacks.
weaknesses: Low hit points may make it vulnerable when discovered or engaged directly.
attacks: A versatile attacker using either a shortsword for close combat or a hand crossbow for ranged strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Ability to poison enemies, potentially leaving them unconscious.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 14, allowing it to effectively notice hidden threats.
skills: Has proficiency in stealth and perception, making it a capable scout.
additional_information: Can cast spells without material components.
Can blend into darkness due to innate abilities.
Focuses on ambush techniques for combat.
Employs strategic movement to evade detection.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability linked to Wisdom, allowing cast without material components.
test_queries: dark elf with deadly ranged attacks
humanoid that excels in darkness and stealth
warrior that uses poison in combat
